To generate header file:
```
javac -h . Native.java
```

Output:
```cpp
/* DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - it is machine generated */
#include <jni.h>
/* Header for class com_komanov_jni_rs_bin_Native */

#ifndef _Included_com_komanov_jni_rs_bin_Native
#define _Included_com_komanov_jni_rs_bin_Native
#ifdef __cplusplus
extern "C" {
#endif
/*
 * Class:     com_komanov_jni_rs_bin_Native
 * Method:    greet
 * Signature: (Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/String;
 */
JNIEXPORT jstring JNICALL Java_com_komanov_jni_rs_bin_Native_greet
  (JNIEnv *, jclass, jstring);

#ifdef __cplusplus
}
#endif
#endif
```
